entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 2 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
